MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the PA8 postcode area of Erskine, affecting properties in Mains Hill and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 1.47pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.43pm on Wednesday 7th April 2021.
